lines.text:
* You should probably go
  talk to the Lorekeeper

* Come back once you've
  done that

* So...
  You really spoke to him

* Then you know what
  you are...

* Some truths...
  They only take root when
  you hear them yourself

* The world you've known...
  It's only the first layer

* There's a path UP.
  Not forward, not back... UP
* It's not a place you walk to It's a place you step into

* And once you take that
  step nothing will ever
  be the same
